creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: I am pro testing: we need more testing widely available. Instead of factual information, we are receiving lies, and staged “protests” rooted in ignorance. Both of these issues remain trapped in the space framed on one hand by science and transparency, and on the other, by political manipulation.
title: May 7, 2020: PRO TESTING! ANTI IGNORANCE.
